Nemesis Enforcer/Double Punch/ Injector/Manterror:

::Nemesis followed Zardus back to the alliance base::
============================================================

::Double Punch fired four energy signature-seeking missiles at Liono::
"Die!"

::Manterror fired two ion discs at the right side of Liono:: "Enjoy the 
company of Primus, fool!"

::Injector fired off three stinger missiles at Liono Prime's lower abdomen:: 
"SEE YOU IN THE PIT YOU PACIFIC (as in pacifist, not Pacific Ocean) IDIOT!"
